install.name: IceSlideshow
install.author: IceTheme
install.description: The IceSlideShow module display your images in a smooth and smart way. Brought to you by IceTheme

param.name: IceSlideshow_hu
param.label: Images Path
param.description: Path to the image directory, relative or absolute, default is the root directory of the website, use an empty string for the same directory as the webpage

param.name: IceSlideshow_width
param.label: Width (px)
param.description: The width for the SlideShow

param.name: IceSlideshow_height
param.label: Height (px)
param.description: The height for the SlideShow

param.name: IceSlideshow_thumbnails
param.label: Thumbnails
param.description: The small images that apper on the bottom or on the right of the slideshow.

param.name: IceSlideshow_thumbnails_position
param.label: Thumbnails Positions
param.description: When do you want the image thumbnails to appear.

param.name: IceSlideshow_thumbnails_width
param.label: Thumbnails Width (px)
param.description: The width for the small images that apper next to the images (Thumbnails)

param.name: IceSlideshow_thumbnails_height
param.label: Thumbnails Height (px)
param.description: The height for the small images that apper next to the images (Thumbnails)

param.name: IceSlideshow_captions
param.label: Captions
param.description: The captions will show when an image change on the bottom of the image. Caption text is the article title.

param.name: IceSlideshow_controller
param.label: Controllers
param.description: The controllers are the image options that apper when you move the mouse over the image, like previous, next, play, pause ect.

param.name: IceSlideshow_fast
param.label: Fast
param.description: The slideshow will not wait until the current transition completes, but update the slide change instantly.

param.name: IceSlideshow_linked
param.label: Linked
param.description: Whether the class should automatically link each slide to the fullsize image, useful when mashing Slideshow with Slimbox, Lightbox, etc.

param.name: IceSlideshow_overlap
param.label: Overlap
param.description: Whether images overlap in the basic show, or if the first image transitions out before the second transitions in

param.name: IceSlideshow_random
param.label: Random
param.description: The SlideShow dont change the images using an order, bur rather on a random way (Very cool!).

param.name: IceSlideshow_center
param.label: Center
param.description: Whether the SlideShow should attempt to center images to fit the width/height used.

param.name: IceSlideshow_resize
param.label: Resize
param.description: Whether the SlideShow should attempt to resize images, based on the width side or height side.

param.name: IceSlideshow_transition
param.label: Transition
param.description: Select the transition effect that you would like to see when the image change.

param.name: IceSlideshow_slide
param.label: Slide (ms)
param.description: Enter the image number that you would like to see first when the IceSlideShow start.

param.name: IceSlideshow_delay
param.label: Delay (ms)
param.description: The delay between slide changes in milliseconds (1000 = 1 second).

param.name: IceSlideshow_duration
param.label: Duration (ms)
param.description: The duration of the effect in milliseconds (1000 = 1 second).

param.name: catid
param.label: Category Items
param.description: Assign a Category to display Items

param.name: order
param.label: Article Ordering
param.description: Select the order for Articles

param.name: items
param.label: Number of Items
param.description: How many items do you want to display?

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: Add a Suffix to IceCarousel Module

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
